entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
